Documentation for excalibuhr#

excalibuhr is a Python package for data reduction of high-resolution spectroscopy of exoplanets and brown dwarfs. It has an end-to-end pipeline for VLT/CRIRES+, and will be extended to other similar instruments such as Keck/NIRSPEC in the future.

Contact#

Contributions, feature requests, or bug reports are welcome through Github page or email to yzhang@strw.leidenuniv.nl
